sourceMeaningMnemonic: Who goes into their <radical>yurt</radical> to <radical>boil</radical> things? <kanji>All</kanji> the people you've ever known. You don't boil things outside, are you crazy?
meaningInfo: Wait, you're telling me all people don't do the same things? Excuse me?
readingMnemonic: Here, <kanji>all</kanji> the people I know do this, so just let me <reading>show</reading> (<ja>しょ</ja>) you how. First you go into your yurt, hey! Pay attention and watch what I'm showing you.
readingInfo: Okay, now that I've shown you what to do, you're just like all of us.
